mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( IDX, ID, PASSWORD, EMAIL, NAME, PHONE, PROFILEURL, POSTCODE, ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, ROLES, REGISTER_TIME, DELETE_YN ) VALUES ( SQ_USERS.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{profileUrl}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, 'ROLE_USER', sysdate, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, ID, PASSWORD, EMAIL, NAME, PHONE, PROFILEURL, POSTCODE, ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, ROLES, REGISTER_TIME, DELETE_YN FROM USERS WHERE ID = #{id}
